text: St. Bonaventure University is a private, Roman Catholic university in Allegany, New York. The university has about 2,500 students. It was founded in 1858. The current president of the university is Jeff Gingerich. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Bonnies. They have 14 varsity teams and they compete in the Atlantic 10 Conference. ==Other websites== *St. Bonaventure University's Official website *St. Bonaventure Bonnies' Official athletics website Category:Atlantic 10 Conference Category:1858 establishments in the United States Category:1850s establishments in New York (state) Category:Colleges and universities in New York (state) Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States
title: St. Bonaventure University
